DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether asthmatic different adenosine receptor expression profile healthy control . We hypothesize asthmatic increase adenosine receptor expression versus control subject . We also want study effect allergen inhalation adenosine receptor expression asthmatic . We believe adenosine receptor expression upregulated allergen inhalation . Both hypothesis test sputum peripheral blood .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Allergen Inhalation Adenosine Receptor Expression Sputum Peripheral Blood
DOC.criteria: Asthmatic Subjects Clinical diagnosis asthma Steroid naive subject use inhaled steroid last 4 week , shortacting betaagonist rescue medication FEV1 > 70 % predict Positive skin prick test house dust mite , cat grass pollen PC20 methacholine histamine < 8 mg/ml Asthmatic Subjects Use systemic steroid previous 6 week Asthma exacerbation previous 6 week Current exsmokers ≥ 10 packyears ( ≥ 2 pipe packyears ) , ex smoker stop less 1 year ago Healthy Subjects No airway complaint FEV1 > 90 % predict Negative skin prick test PC20 methacholine histamine > 8 mg/ml Healthy Subjects Use steroids previous 6 week Current exsmokers ≥ 10 packyears ( ≥ 2 pipe packyears ) , ex smoker stop less 1 year ago
